<div class="well">
In this website and repository, we detail the collection of quality control steps and analyses applied to the 450k UK Biobank exomes release using the RAP. Each step of the quality control pipeline is explained in detail and links to python code utilising the [hail](https://hail.is/) software developed in the Neale lab and R code used to generate the plots that you see when clicking around the website.
